data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.

data.instruction: Run compliance workflow checks (credential sharing/access control/privacy constraints) for this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Access is scoped correctly and compliance workflow state is traceable in operational records.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.
